mapper.select: SELECT TMI.MENU_INFO_SEQ, TMI.MENU_NAME, TMI.USE_YN, TMI.DEL_YN, TMI.INPT_SEQ, TMI.INPT_DATE, TMI.UPD_SEQ, TMI.UPD_DATE, (SELECT USER_NAME FROM TB_USER_DETAIL TUD WHERE TUD.USER_SEQ = TMI.INPT_SEQ) AS INPT_USER_NAME, (SELECT USER_NAME FROM TB_USER_DETAIL TUD WHERE TUD.USER_SEQ = TMI.UPD_SEQ) AS UPD_USER_NAME FROM TB_MENU_INFO TMI WHERE 1=1 AND TMI.DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT TUD.USER_NAME, TUL.USER_ID, TUL.USER_SEQ, (SELECT USER_NAME FROM TB_USER_DETAIL STUD WHERE STUD.USER_SEQ = TMAL.INPT_SEQ) AS INPT_USER_NAME, TMAL.INPT_DATE FROM TB_MENU_ADMIN_LIST TMAL INNER JOIN TB_USER_LIST TUL ON TMAL.USER_SEQ = TUL.USER_SEQ INNER JOIN TB_USER_DETAIL TUD ON TUL.USER_SEQ = TUD.USER_SEQ INNER JOIN tb_user_list TUA ON TUL.USER_SEQ = TUA.USER_SEQ WHERE 1=1 AND TMAL.MENU_INFO_SEQ = #{menu_info_seq} AND TUA.USER_AUTH IN ('ROLE_ADMIN','ROLE_MENU') AND TUL.OUT_YN = 'N' ORDER BY TMAL.INPT_DATE DESC

SELECT TMI.MENU_INFO_SEQ, TMI.MENU_NAME, TMI.REMARK, TMI.USE_YN, TMI.DEL_YN, TMI.INPT_SEQ, TMI.INPT_DATE, TMI.UPD_SEQ, TMI.UPD_DATE, (SELECT USER_NAME FROM TB_USER_DETAIL TUD WHERE TUD.USER_SEQ = TMI.INPT_SEQ) AS INPT_USER_NAME, (SELECT USER_NAME FROM TB_USER_DETAIL TUD WHERE TUD.USER_SEQ = TMI.UPD_SEQ) AS UPD_USER_NAME FROM TB_MENU_INFO TMI WHERE 1=1 AND TMI.DEL_YN = 'N' AND TMI.MENU_INFO_SEQ = #{menu_info_seq}

SELECT TM.MENU_INFO_SEQ, TM.MENU_SEQ, TM.MENU_TITLE, TM.MENU_TYPE, TM.MENU_LINK, TM.MENU_LINK_TYPE, TM.PRT_SEQ, TM.USE_YN, TM.REMARK, TM.INPT_SEQ, TM.INPT_DATE, TM.MENU_JSON FROM TB_MENU TM WHERE 1=1 AND TM.MENU_INFO_SEQ = #{menu_info_seq} AND TM.MENU_JSON IS NOT NULL -- 관리자에서는 JSON으로만 리스트를 만들기때문에 1줄만 있으면 된다. ORDER BY TM.MENU_SEQ ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_MENU_INFO ( MENU_NAME, REMARK, USE_YN, DEL_YN, INPT_SEQ, INPT_DATE ) VALUES ( #{menu_name}, #{remark}, #{use_yn}, 'N', #{inpt_seq}, SYSDATE )
INSERT INTO TB_MENU_ADMIN_LIST ( MENU_INFO_SEQ, USER_SEQ, INPT_SEQ, INPT_DATE ) VALUES ( #{menu_info_seq}, #{user_seq}, #{inpt_seq}, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_MENU_INFO SET MENU_NAME = #{menu_name}, REMARK = #{remark}, USE_YN = #{use_yn}, UPD_SEQ = #{upd_seq}, UPD_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE MENU_INFO_SEQ = #{menu_info_seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_MENU ( MENU_INFO_SEQ, MENU_SEQ, MENU_TITLE, MENU_TYPE, MENU_LINK, MENU_LINK_TYPE, PRT_SEQ, SHOW_YN, HIGHLIGHT_YN, USE_YN, REMARK, MENU_JSON, MENU_ORDER, MENU_DEPTH, INPT_SEQ, INPT_DATE ) VALUES ( #{menu_info_seq}, #{menu_seq}, #{menu_title}, #{menu_type}, #{menu_link}, #{menu_link_type}, #{prt_seq}, #{show_yn}, #{highlight_yn}, #{use_yn}, #{remark}, #{menu_json}, #{menu_order}, #{menu_depth}, #{inpt_seq}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT TBI.BBS_CD AS MENU_LINK_SEQ, TBI.BBS_NM AS MENU_LINK_TITLE, COUNT(TM.MENU_SEQ) AS FLAG FROM TB_BBS_INFO TBI LEFT JOIN TB_MENU TM ON TM.MENU_LINK = CONCAT('/article/',TBI.BBS_CD) AND TM.MENU_INFO_SEQ = #{menu_info_seq} WHERE 1=1 AND TBI.BBS_DEL_YN = 'N' AND TBI.BBS_USE_YN = 'Y' group by TBI.BBS_CD, TBI.BBS_NM ORDER BY TBI.BBS_NM ASC

SELECT THC.HTML_SEQ AS MENU_LINK_SEQ, THC.HTML_TITLE AS MENU_LINK_TITLE, COUNT(TM.MENU_SEQ) AS FLAG FROM TB_HTML_CONTENT THC LEFT JOIN TB_MENU TM ON TM.MENU_LINK = CONCAT('/page/',THC.HTML_SEQ) AND TM.MENU_INFO_SEQ = #{menu_info_seq} WHERE 1=1 AND THC.DEL_YN = 'N' group by THC.HTML_SEQ, THC.HTML_TITLE ORDER BY THC.HTML_TITLE ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_MENU SET MENU_JSON = NULL WHERE MENU_INFO_SEQ = #{menu_info_seq} AND MENU_SEQ NOT IN ( SELECT DD.MENU_SEQ FROM ( SELECT TM.MENU_SEQ FROM TB_MENU TM WHERE TM.MENU_INFO_SEQ = 1 ORDER BY TM.MENU_SEQ ASC LIMIT 0, 1) DD )
